org.helm.editor.data

Class MonomerStoreCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.helm.editor.data.MonomerStoreCache

  • public class MonomerStoreCache
extends java.lang.Object
    Describes a database containing 2 monomer stores: 1. Store that is held by MonomerFactory. 2. XHELM Store (external Monomers).
    Author:
    M.Lanig

      • setExternalMonomers

        public void setExternalMonomers(org.helm.notation.MonomerStore store)
        Resets the cached external MonomerStore to given Parameter. Combined Store gets refreshed.
        Parameters:
        store - monomer store to set.

      • addExternalMonomers

        public java.lang.String addExternalMonomers(javax.swing.JFrame owner,
                                   org.helm.notation.MonomerStore store,
                                   java.lang.String helmString)
                                     throws java.io.IOException,
                                            org.helm.notation.MonomerException,
                                            java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Adds monomers to the external Monomer Database. Existing monomers won't be deleted. A check for conflicting monomers is done before.
        Parameters:
        db - monomer store to add
        Returns:
        true when added successfully, else false.
        Throws:
        org.helm.notation.MonomerException - may occur when trying to add a monomer to the database
        java.io.IOException - may occur when trying to add a monomer to the database
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when at least one conflict was found.

      • clearCustomMonomerDB

        public void clearCustomMonomerDB()
        Clears all custom monomers in the database.
